title: Python
details: Versatile language for automation, backend scripts, machine learning, and data analysis.
source: Machine learning (Jupyter notebooks), utility scripts (traceroute mapping, password cracking), unit testing, CLI scripting

title: Bash
details: Command-line scripting language for automating tasks in Unix/Linux environments.
source: Automation scripts for CLI workflows, concurrent program testing, build/test scripting

title: Ruby
details: Dynamic, interpreted scripting language focused on simplicity and developer productivity.
source: Academic OOP scripting projects, Ruby language basics

title: PowerShell
details: Command-line scripting language and shell designed for task automation and configuration management in Windows environments.
source: Used for scripting, automation, and file operations on Windows systems
